src:
Iwan Bule Gantung Ekspektasi Besar Terhadap Timnas Indonesia U-19
05 Nov 2019, 22:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Timnas Indonesia U-19 akan memulai kiprahnya di Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020. Ajang dua tahunan tersebut bakal digelar pada 6-10 November 2019.
Beberapa hari jelang event tersebut, Ketua Umum (Ketum) PSSI, Mochamad Iriawan menyampaikan pesan untuk Timnas Indonesia U-19. Pria yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule ini ingin agar pasukan Fakhri Husaini itu tampil maksimal di setiap laga.
"Kami PSSI sama seperti masyarakat. Ekspektasi saya kepada mereka itu luar biasa. Semoga mereka itu benar-benar bisa sesuai harapan publik," ujar Iwan Bule.
"Oleh sebab itu, saya terus konsen kepada mereka untuk menyampaikan bagaimana ekspektasi masyarakat. Bagaimana persatuan bola itu kalau memang mereka bisa masuk dalam tempat yang diinginkan oleh rakyat. Sehingga nantinya bisa sangat dibanggakan," katanya menambahkan.

text:
Iwan Bule Hanging Great Expectations Against the Indonesian National Team U-19
05 Nov 2019, 22:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian U-19 national team will begin its work in the AFC U-19 2020 Qualification Cup. The biennial event will be held on 6-10 November 2019.
A few days before the event, PSSI General Chairman (Ketum), Mochamad Iriawan delivered a message for the Indonesian U-19 national team. The man who is familiarly called Iwan Bule wants the Fakhri Husaini troops to perform optimally in every fight.
"We, PSSI, are the same as the community. My expectations of them are extraordinary. Hopefully they really can meet the public's expectations," said Iwan Bule.
"Therefore, I continue to concentrate on them to convey how the community's expectations are. How about the unity of the ball if indeed they can enter the place desired by the people. So that later they can be very proud of," he added.
